short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables continuous audio playback for the King James Bible online audio player.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
KingJamesBibleOnline.com doesn't natively have continuous audio playback.

This extension enables continuous audio playback on KingJamesBibleOnline.com.

You can now enjoy the King James version Bible via KingJamesBibleOnline.com with unending audio.
